name: Teafant

ability.name: Soothing Shower
ability.description: When activated, spouts mysterious water that soothes wounds and restores the player's HP.

description: Large amounts of water pour from what is thought to be its nose, though some say that it is, in fact, just snot. This has sparked a fierce debate among Pal scholars.

skills.name: Aqua Gun
skills.description: Hurls a ball of water straight at an enemy.

skills.name: Hydro Jet
skills.description: Hurls a high speed ball of water at an enemy.

skills.name: Sand Blast
skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

skills.name: Bubble Blast
skills.description: Fires numerous bubbles that slowly pursue an enemy.

skills.name: Acid Rain
skills.description: Creates acidic clouds that pour down acid rain on enemies.

skills.name: Aqua Burst
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of water and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: Hydro Laser
skills.description: Shoots pressurized water at extreme velocities, sweeping over a wide area in front of it.
